info.title: Working days
info.description: Working days service. It covers more than 45 countries and 230 regional calendars. It also covers main stock exchanges calendars. The quality of data is the top priority. API offers up to date information by following government announcements regarding public holidays changes.

get.description: Add (or remove) any number of working days to a date.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters).

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: increment
parameters.description: The number of working days you want to add to your start date (positive or negative integer but not zero).

parameters.name: include_start
parameters.description: Should the count include the start_date? Default value is true.

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The name of the regional preset configuration. See documentation for more.

parameters.name: weekend
parameters.description: Your weekend structure. Sunday-Monday-Tuesday-Wednesday-Thursday-Friday-Saturday. If the weekend for you is Sunday and Monday, you can send: 1100000 If the weekend is Saturday afternoon and Sunday: 1000003

parameters.name: week_times
parameters.description: Your week working schedule structure. This parameter is useful when computing work hours over a period. When used, this parameter overides the week_hours parameter.

parameters.name: start_template
parameters.description: The start date of an alternating week template (YYYY-MM-DD) If you define an alternating week template schedule, you have to tell which sunday the template is starting.

parameters.name: use_custom_configuration
parameters.description: Take into account your own personal configuration.

parameters.name: profile_id
parameters.description: If you created several profiles under your custom configuration, the ID of the profile to be used. 6 characters.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Accept

working_days.title: Working days

total.title: All working total
total.description: Total working days within the period

working_days.description: All working days within the period

weekend_days.title: Weekend days
weekend_days.description: All weekend days within the period

total.description: Total weekend days within the period

tuesdays.description: Weekend days taking place on Tuesdays within the period

sundays.title: All weekend days on Sundays

get.description: Analyze a period (provide a start_date and an end_date over a given calendar, API responds with the period analysis).

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters).

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: The start time (HH:MM)

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: The end time (HH:MM)

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The name of the regional preset configuration. See documentation for more.

parameters.name: weekend
parameters.description: Your weekend structure. Sunday-Monday-Tuesday-Wednesday-Thursday-Friday-Saturday. If the weekend for you is Sunday and Monday, you can send: 1100000 If the weekend is Saturday afternoon and Sunday: 1000003

parameters.name: week_times
parameters.description: Your week working schedule structure. This parameter is useful when computing work hours over a period. When used, this parameter overides the week_hours parameter.

parameters.name: start_template
parameters.description: The start date of an alternating week template (YYYY-MM-DD) If you define an alternating week template schedule, you have to tell which sunday the template is starting.

parameters.name: use_custom_configuration
parameters.description: Take into account your own personal configuration.

parameters.name: profile_id
parameters.description: If you created several profiles under your custom configuration, the ID of the profile to be used. 6 characters.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Accept

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific day.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters).

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date to analyze (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The name of the regional preset configuration. See documentation for more.

parameters.name: weekend
parameters.description: Your weekend structure. Sunday-Monday-Tuesday-Wednesday-Thursday-Friday-Saturday. If the weekend for you is Sunday and Monday, you can send: 1100000 If the weekend is Saturday afternoon and Sunday: 1000003

parameters.name: use_custom_configuration
parameters.description: Take into account your own personal configuration.

parameters.name: profile_id
parameters.description: If you created several profiles under your custom configuration, the ID of the profile to be used. 6 characters.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Accept

working_day.description: Is this a working day (0 means no).
working_day.title: Working day

work_hours.description: Number of working hours on that day.
work_hours.title: Working hours

public_holiday.description: Is this a public holiday (0 means no).
public_holiday.title: Public holiday

weekend_day.description: Is this a weekend day (0 means no).
weekend_day.title: Weekend day

custom_date.description: Is this a custom date (0 means no).
custom_date.title: Custom date

custom_date_color.description: Color defined for this custom date.
custom_date_color.title: Custom date color

get.description: List the non working days (weekend days, public holidays and custom dates) between 2 dates.

parameters.name: start_date

parameters.name: weekend

parameters.name: use_custom_configuration
parameters.description: Take into account your own personal configuration.

parameters.name: profile_id
parameters.description: If you created several profiles under your custom configuration, the ID of the profile to be used. 6 characters.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Accept

get.description: Add an amount of working time to a given start date/time.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters).

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: The start time (HH:MM)

parameters.name: increment_time
parameters.description: The amount of working time to be added (or removed) to the start date time. Format: H:i

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The name of the regional preset configuration. See documentation for more.

parameters.name: weekend
parameters.description: Your weekend structure. Sunday-Monday-Tuesday-Wednesday-Thursday-Friday-Saturday. If the weekend for you is Sunday and Monday, you can send: 1100000 If the weekend is Saturday afternoon and Sunday: 1000003

parameters.name: week_times
parameters.description: Your week working schedule structure. This parameter is useful when computing work hours over a period. When used, this parameter overides the week_hours parameter.

parameters.name: start_template
parameters.description: The start date of an alternating week template (YYYY-MM-DD) If you define an alternating week template schedule, you have to tell which sunday the template is starting.

parameters.name: use_custom_configuration
parameters.description: Take into account your own personal configuration.

parameters.name: profile_id
parameters.description: If you created several profiles under your custom configuration, the ID of the profile to be used. 6 characters.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Accept

get.description: Add days where public holidays are taking place to a given date.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters).

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: increment
parameters.description: The number of days being public holidays you want to add to your start date (positive or negative integer but not zero).

parameters.name: include_start
parameters.description: Should the count include the start_date? Default value is true.

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The name of the regional preset configuration. See documentation for more.

parameters.name: weekend
parameters.description: Your weekend structure. Sunday-Monday-Tuesday-Wednesday-Thursday-Friday-Saturday. If the weekend for you is Sunday and Monday, you can send: 1100000 If the weekend is Saturday afternoon and Sunday: 1000003

parameters.name: week_times
parameters.description: Your week working schedule structure. This parameter is useful when computing work hours over a period. When used, this parameter overides the week_hours parameter.

parameters.name: start_template
parameters.description: The start date of an alternating week template (YYYY-MM-DD) If you define an alternating week template schedule, you have to tell which sunday the template is starting.

parameters.name: use_custom_configuration
parameters.description: Take into account your own personal configuration.

parameters.name: profile_id
parameters.description: If you created several profiles under your custom configuration, the ID of the profile to be used. 6 characters.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Accept

get.description: Sometimes it may be needed to identify which calendar configuration is relevant to a given customer's postal address. This service returns the appropriate country_code & configuration for a given postal adresss.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The postal address. It is a string with no constraint.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Accept

get.description: Check quota of left days to use within the current month and available for the next month.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Accept

current.description: Current quota (days left to be analyzed within this month).
current.title: Current
